author: Aniva
releaseNotes:
Major v4.15 Cumulative Update. 

1. ATTRIBUTE REFACTOR: Standardized all state variables to CamelCase (e.g., 'powerRealTimeW') to align with Hubitat standards. 
2. DASHBOARD TILE: Added configurable 'Live Status' HTML tile with customizable kW thresholds (Red/Yellow/Green). 
3. AUTOMATION: Added 'powerLevel' attribute (High/Medium/Active/Idle) for simplified Rule Machine logic. 
4. UX: Added Visual CSS labels to Preferences and fixed icon/stability issues.
